results.title: A cardiovascular polypill for secondary stroke prevention in a tertiary centre in Ghana (SMAART): a phase 2 randomised clinical trial
results.text_hl: When available, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ subtype information was collected to classify @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischaemic stroke@@@ using the TOAST classification into large-artery, lacunar, and unclassified @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischaemic strokes@@@.

citations.NLM: Sarfo FS, Voeks J, Adamu S, Agyei BA, Agbenorku M, Adu-Darko N, Oteng MA, Obese V, Gyamfi RA, Mensah NA, Tagge R, Ampofo M, Kontoh SA, Nguah SB, Ovbiagele B. A cardiovascular polypill for secondary stroke prevention in a tertiary centre in Ghana (SMAART): a phase 2 randomised clinical trial Lancet Glob Health. 2023 Oct;11(10):e1619-e1628. PMID: 37734804
citations.BibTeX: @article{37734804, title={A cardiovascular polypill for secondary stroke prevention in a tertiary centre in Ghana (SMAART): a phase 2 randomised clinical trial}, author={Sarfo FS and Voeks J and Adamu S and Agyei BA and Agbenorku M and Adu-Darko N and Oteng MA and Obese V and Gyamfi RA and Mensah NA and Tagge R and Ampofo M and Kontoh SA and Nguah SB and Ovbiagele B}, journal={Lancet Glob Health}, volume={11}, number={10}, pages={e1619-e1628}}

results.title: Trial of secondary prevention with atenolol after transient ischemic attack or nondisabling ischemic stroke. The Dutch TIA Trial Study Group.
results.text_hl: Trial of secondary prevention with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ after @DISEASE_Ischemic_Attack_Transient @DISEASE_MESH:D002546 @@@transient ischemic attack@@@ or nondisabling @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@.

citations.NLM: Trial of secondary prevention with atenolol after transient ischemic attack or nondisabling ischemic stroke. The Dutch TIA Trial Study Group. Stroke. 1993 Apr;24(4):543-8. PMID: 8465360

results.title: Effect of angiotensin II type 1 receptor blocker, candesartan, and beta 1 adrenoceptor blocker, atenolol, on brain damage in ischemic stroke.
results.text_hl: Effect of angiotensin II type 1 receptor blocker, @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@, and @GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_24925 @@@beta 1 adrenoceptor@@@ blocker, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, on @DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@.

citations.NLM: Saad MA, Abbas AM, Boshra V, Elkhateeb M, El Aal IA. Effect of angiotensin II type 1 receptor blocker, candesartan, and beta 1 adrenoceptor blocker, atenolol, on brain damage in ischemic stroke. Acta Physiol Hung. 2010 Jun;97(2):159-71. PMID: 20511125

results.title: Impaired glucose tolerance increases stroke risk in nondiabetic patients with transient ischemic attack or minor ischemic stroke.
results.text_hl: METHODS: In total, 3127 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a @DISEASE_Ischemic_Attack_Transient @DISEASE_MESH:D002546 @@@TIA@@@ or minor @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@ participated in the Dutch @DISEASE_Ischemic_Attack_Transient @DISEASE_MESH:D002546 @@@TIA@@@ Trial, testing 2 different doses of @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ versus placebo.

citations.NLM: Vermeer SE, Sandee W, Algra A, Koudstaal PJ, Kappelle LJ, Dippel DW, Dutch TIA Trial Study Group. Impaired glucose tolerance increases stroke risk in nondiabetic patients with transient ischemic attack or minor ischemic stroke. Stroke. 2006 Jun;37(6):1413-7. PMID: 16627787
